channel.title: Help changeing options and emote look
channel.description:
hello i am having problems with my server
1)i look inside my cache for sprites and i see that there are emote sprites. not the word ones. but when i play the server it shows the words. can anyone help me change it bak to just pictures like runescape stile(sorry don't know how to spell). and make it have a working skillcape option
2)the other thing was when i go to the option menu it has this thing i've never scene before. and i have the picture sprites for the one i'm familiar with. can anyone help me change it back to the original way. i would be so happy.
[size=24pt]HERE IS THE PICTURE OF THE MENUS I HAVE NOW[/size]
[img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2hfrnzb.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt] Note: this is 317[/size]
the server is evolutionX
i dont know if that will help you.

item.title: Help changeing options and emote look
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:

hello i am having problems with my server

1)i look inside my cache for sprites and i see that there are emote sprites. not the word ones. but when i play the server it shows the words. can anyone help me change it bak to just pictures like runescape stile(sorry don’t know how to spell). and make it have a working skillcape option
